TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_laluma'an_nu_Tali, title = laluma'an_nu_Tali, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/laluma'an_nu_Tali} }

S.FORM: u kasahenulay a laluma'an ku laluma'an nu Tali nu kalikiday a nanum (Amilika a kamu: House Tully of the Riverrun) i bukebukelalan. u bayabay nu laluma'an nu Tali sa, u mudebutay a buting i sumilaway atu sumanahay a kulit. u kamu nu Laluma'an nu Tali sa, u laluma'an, dungus, sakasipising.( Amilika a kamu: Family, Duty, Honors; kamu nu Hulam:家族,責任,榮譽) laylay nu laluma'an nu Tali saayaway a laylay nu laluma'an nu Tali sa, malingatu i saayaway a tademaw hananay. nidebengan nu laluma'an nu Takelian caay kanamuh ku katuuday i bukebukelalaln tu mukeliday nu subasubalan sananay, u sala'cusay a mukeliday nida; kyu, manamuh ku katuuday nu bukebukelalan ku nisebengan nu laluma'an nu Takelian; sisa, i nudikudan nu niswbengan sa, pasidungus ci Ekun tu Eytemuy Tali, malamukeliday ci Eytemuy Tali nu Bukebukelalan. micidekay atu lalangawan u micidakay a cenengan nu laluma'an nu Tali sa, u kasahenulan a aenengan nu malalais nu tau, maydih tu aenengan nu laluma'an nu Tali, taneng tu misebeng tu dumaay a laluma'an hananay. ayda a kasahenulay a tademaw nu laluma'an nu Tali Hoste Tali u mukeliday nu laluma'an nu Tali. Katelin Tali u sakakaay a wawana ni Hoste Tali. Laysa Tali u sakatusa a wawana ni Hoste Tali. Eytemuy Tali u sasabaay a wawa ni Hoste Tali, u aydaay a mukeliday nu laluma'an nu Tali i sililinay a luma' nu kalikiday a nanum i bukebukelalan. Luslin Buley u acawa ni Eytemuy Tali, sibili tu ayda. Pulanten Tali u saba ni Hoste Tali, u "lumeni'ay a buting" ku nipangangan nu tau, caay katineng i cuwaay nida ayda. mikeliday a laluma'an laluma'an nu Buley i malapiay a sililinay a luma' malalitin tu ihekaay atu zumaay a natinengan nasulitan ni Padakaw Lami'2020. u Wipsay nu misulitay ci Georgr RR Martin manamuhay a Wikipayke dadiw nu sulda atu lamal

o kasahenolay a laloma'an ko laloma'an no Tali no kalikiday a nanom (Amilika a kamo: Hoose Tolly of the Riverron) i bokebokelalan. o bayabay no laloma'an no Tali sa, o modebotay a boting i somilaway ato somanahay a kolit. o kamo no Laloma'an no Tali sa, o laloma'an, dongos, sakasipising.( Amilika a kamo: Family, Doty, Honors; kamo no Holam:家族,責任,榮譽) laylay no laloma'an no Tali saayaway a laylay no laloma'an no Tali sa, malingato i saayaway a tademaw hananay. nidebengan no laloma'an no Takelian caay kanamoh ko katooday i bokebokelalaln to mokeliday no sobasobalan sananay, o sala'cosay a mokeliday nida; kyo, manamoh ko katooday no bokebokelalan ko nisebengan no laloma'an no Takelian; sisa, i nodikodan no niswbengan sa, pasidongos ci Ekon to Eytemoy Tali, malamokeliday ci Eytemoy Tali no Bokebokelalan. micidekay ato lalangawan o micidakay a cenengan no laloma'an no Tali sa, o kasahenolan a aenengan no malalais no tao, maydih to aenengan no laloma'an no Tali, taneng to misebeng to domaay a laloma'an hananay. ayda a kasahenolay a tademaw no laloma'an no Tali Hoste Tali o mokeliday no laloma'an no Tali. Katelin Tali o sakakaay a wawana ni Hoste Tali. Laysa Tali o sakatosa a wawana ni Hoste Tali. Eytemoy Tali o sasabaay a wawa ni Hoste Tali, o aydaay a mokeliday no laloma'an no Tali i sililinay a loma' no kalikiday a nanom i bokebokelalan. Loslin Boley o acawa ni Eytemoy Tali, sibili to ayda. Polanten Tali o saba ni Hoste Tali, o "lomeni'ay a boting" ko nipangangan no tao, caay katineng i cowaay nida ayda. mikeliday a laloma'an laloma'an no Boley i malapiay a sililinay a loma' malalitin to ihekaay ato zomaay a natinengan nasolitan ni Padakaw Lami'2020. o Wipsay no misolitay ci Georgr RR Martin manamohay a Wikipayke dadiw no solda ato lamal
